name: Kasidate Phlaiphueak
subtitle: Passionate about technology and continuous learning.
about: I am a software engineer with a passion for learning and exploring new technologies. I have experience in various programming languages and frameworks, including JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, Vue.js, and Java. I enjoy working on challenging projects that push my skills to the limit.

I'm currently pursuing my B.Sc. in Information Technology at King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi with a GPAX of 3.78. My journey in coding began during high school, and I've been fascinated with the constant learning aspect ever since.

I am a team player who thrives on challenges and is adept at working both independently and collaboratively. My proficiency in agile development methodologies further complements my technical abilities, and I am committed to personal and professional growth in the tech industry.

experiences.title: Chatbot Developer Intern - AmitySolutions
experiences.description: Completed a 6-month internship in Chatbot Development, building a chat community and working on chatbot flows change requirement projects. My role involved collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design chatbot flows, and implement features using various technologies.

experiences.title: Web Developer - SIT Announcement Systems
experiences.description: Created a site announcement system using Vue.js and Java Spring Boot. The Spring Boot component provided REST API functionality, including authentication, proxy settings, and Docker deployment. This project improved communication within the School of Information Technology.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Student - KMUTT
experiences.description: Currently pursuing a B.Sc. in Information Technology at King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi with a GPAX of 3.78. Actively participating in coursework, projects, and extracurricular activities that enhance my technical and soft skills.

projects.title: I'm Guide
projects.description: AI-Powered Travel Planning Application for Thailand. Built the frontend with Next.js + LIFF for seamless LINE OA integration and developed the backend with NestJS, connecting AI-powered trip planning, Redis caching, and MongoDB/MySQL databases into a scalable real-time system.

projects.title: SAS - SIT Announcement Systems
projects.description: Created a site announcement system using Vue.js, a JavaScript front-end framework, in conjunction with Java Spring Boot. The Spring Boot component provided REST API functionality, including authentication, proxy settings, and Docker deployment.

projects.title: e-Library Frontend
projects.description: Spearheaded the e-library project with Vue.js, overseeing responsibilities related to project details, system flow, design of a mock API server (JSON server), and management of CRUD operations for the Post Announcement Section.

projects.title: Dating Game
projects.description: Developed a dating-themed game, including storyline, scenes, and dialogues, utilizing Vue.js. Focused on the logic of game design and in-game functions to create an engaging user experience.

projects.title: Todo List Web Application
projects.description: Developed a web application using Java Servlets and JSP that functions as a todo list app with authentication, comprising admin/user pages and implementing CRUD operations for managing todo lists and user profiles.
